LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.Smartstore.PayPal
LocaleResource.Value: Adds the PayPal payment feature to the store.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.Payments.PayPalStandard
LocaleResource.Value: Opens a secure payment window where the payment is made directly at PayPal.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.Payments.PayPalPayUponInvoice
LocaleResource.Value: A buy now, pay later payment method that allows the buyer to place an order, receive the goods, try them, verify they are in good order, and then pay the invoice within 30 days.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.Payments.PayPalSepa
LocaleResource.Value: Opens a secure payment window where the payment is made directly at PayPal.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.Payments.PayPalPayLater
LocaleResource.Value: Opens a secure payment window where the payment is made directly at PayPal.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.Payments.PayPalCreditCard
LocaleResource.Value: Offers the possibility to pay by credit card. The fields for entering credit card data are integrated into the checkout via iframes offered directly by PayPal. The credit card data thus does not come into contact with the store.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.Payments.PayPalGiroPay
LocaleResource.Value: After completing the order, the customer is redirected directly to GiroPay to complete the payment process.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.Payments.PayPalSofort
LocaleResource.Value: After completing the order, the customer is redirected directly to Sofortüberweisung to complete the payment process.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.Payments.PayPalBancontact
LocaleResource.Value: After completing the order, the customer is redirected directly to Bancontact to complete the payment process.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.Payments.PayPalBlik
LocaleResource.Value: After completing the order, the customer is redirected directly to BLIK to complete the payment process.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.Payments.PayPalEps
LocaleResource.Value: After completing the order, the customer is redirected directly to eps-Überweisung to complete the payment process.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.Payments.PayPalIdeal
LocaleResource.Value: After completing the order, the customer is redirected directly to iDEAL to complete the payment process.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.Payments.PayPalMyBank
LocaleResource.Value: After completing the order, the customer is redirected directly to MyBank to complete the payment process.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.Payments.PayPalPrzelewy24
LocaleResource.Value: After completing the order, the customer is redirected directly to Przelewy24 to complete the payment process.

LocaleResource.Name: PayPalStandard
LocaleResource.Value: Do the payment in a secure browser window directly at PayPal. After redirection back to the store, you can complete the order with a few clicks.

LocaleResource.Name: PayPalPayUponInvoice
LocaleResource.Value: Place an order, receive the goods, try them, verify they are in good order, and then pay the invoice within 30 days.

LocaleResource.Name: PayPalSepa
LocaleResource.Value: Do the payment in a secure browser window directly at PayPal. After redirection back to the store, you can complete the order with a few clicks.

LocaleResource.Name: PayPalPayLater
LocaleResource.Value: Do the payment in a secure browser window directly at PayPal. After redirection back to the store, you can complete the order with a few clicks.

LocaleResource.Name: PayPalCreditCard
LocaleResource.Value: Your credit card information is recorded directly on the PayPal server.

LocaleResource.Name: PayPalGiroPay
LocaleResource.Value: You will be redirected to the Giropay website to complete the payment.

LocaleResource.Name: PayPalSofort
LocaleResource.Value: You will be redirected to the Sofortüberweisung website to complete the payment.

LocaleResource.Name: PayPalBancontact
LocaleResource.Value: You will be redirected to the Bancontact website to complete the payment.

LocaleResource.Name: PayPalBlik
LocaleResource.Value: You will be redirected to the BLIK website to complete the payment.

LocaleResource.Name: PayPalEps
LocaleResource.Value: You will be redirected to the eps-Überweisung website to complete the payment.

LocaleResource.Name: PayPalIdeal
LocaleResource.Value: You will be redirected to the iDEAL website to complete the payment.

LocaleResource.Name: PayPalMyBank
LocaleResource.Value: You will be redirected to the MyBank website to complete the payment.

LocaleResource.Name: PayPalPrzelewy24
LocaleResource.Value: You will be redirected to the Przelewy24 website to complete the payment.

LocaleResource.Name: AdminInstruction
LocaleResource.Value:
With this plugin you can use PayPal Checkout and benefit from more payment methods, optimized user experience and future-proof technology.

  • In addition to payment via PayPal, direct debit, credit and debit card, and invoice, PayPal Checkout now enables now offers more than ten additional local payment methods that can make your online store more attractive in Germany and abroad.
  • With dynamic banners and the Pay Later button, you can draw your customers' attention to PayPal Installment.
  • With the PayPal Express Checkout Button, you shorten the checkout process and optimize the buying experience.

To set up PayPal in your store use the button Connect account or alternatively follow the steps in the following guide.

  • Sign in with your PayPal account details in the developer dashboard.
  • Create a new app by clicking on the Create App button.
  • Now enter the account, client ID and secret in the fields provided further down this page.
  • Create a webhook and store the URL below as the webhook URL in your PayPal app.
  • Enable notifications for all events.

LocaleResource.Name: CookieInfo
LocaleResource.Value: PayPal uses cookies to display and process the payment transaction.

LocaleResource.Name: OrderUpdateFailed
LocaleResource.Value: The total amount of the order could not be updated after calculating the shipping costs at PayPal. Please confirm the total amount again with PayPal.

LocaleResource.Name: UseSandbox.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether the payments are executed in the PayPal sandbox.

LocaleResource.Name: ClientId.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enter the client ID for the app you've created in PayPal developer dashboard.

LocaleResource.Name: PayerId.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: You can find the PayPal payer ID in your PayPal account under Account Settings / Business Details.

LocaleResource.Name: MerchantName.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Is needed for the payment method purchase on invoice to create a unique identification key. Must not contain spaces.

LocaleResource.Name: Secret.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enter the secret for the app you've created in PayPal developer dashboard.

LocaleResource.Name: WebhookId.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enter the ID that PayPal has generated for your webhook.

LocaleResource.Name: WebhookUrl.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Save this URL in your PayPal app as a webhook URL.

LocaleResource.Name: DisabledFundings.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The disabled funding sources for the transaction. Any funding sources passed are not displayed. Funding source eligibility is determined based on a variety of factors.

LocaleResource.Name: EnabledFundings.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Funding source eligibility is determined based on a variety of factors. Enable funding can be used to ensure a funding source is rendered, if eligible.

LocaleResource.Name: PayUponInvoiceLimit
LocaleResource.Value: Upper limit for Pay Upon Invoice

LocaleResource.Name: PayUponInvoiceLimit.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Defines the upper limit up to which payments upon invoice are offered. Currently, this limit is €2,500, but may differ in individual cases.

LocaleResource.Name: DisplayProductDetailPayLaterWidget.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether to display the pay later widget on the product detail page. Please note that the widget will not be displayed in the selected language when the customer changes the language.

LocaleResource.Name: CustomerServiceInstructions.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enter here a note text about the accessibility of the customer service.

LocaleResource.Name: Intent.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether the payment is executed immediately or later through interaction of the merchant.

LocaleResource.Name: Intent.Alert
LocaleResource.Value: Please note that the reservation of payments is only supported with the PayPal payment methods PayPal Checkout, Purchase on Invoice, Pay Later, Credit Card and Direct Debit.

LocaleResource.Name: FundingsOffCanvasCart.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies which payment options should be displayed in the mini shopping cart.

LocaleResource.Name: FundingsCart.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies which payment options to display on the shopping cart page.

LocaleResource.Name: ButtonShape.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Defines the shape of the PayPal button.

LocaleResource.Name: ButtonColor.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Defines the color of the PayPal button.

LocaleResource.Name: Onboarding.Success
LocaleResource.Value: Your store has been successfully linked to your PayPal account.

LocaleResource.Name: Error.PaymentsReceivable
LocaleResource.Value: Payments cannot be received with this account. Please contact PayPal.

LocaleResource.Name: Error.PrimaryEmailConfirmed
LocaleResource.Value: The email address of this account has not been confirmed yet. Please contact PayPal or check your email inbox.

LocaleResource.Name: Error.Refund.NoTransactionId
LocaleResource.Value: No transaction ID was stored for this order. Please check the connection of your webhook.

LocaleResource.Name: PrimaryEmailConfirmed.True
LocaleResource.Value: The primary email address with PayPal is confirmed.

LocaleResource.Name: PrimaryEmailConfirmed.False
LocaleResource.Value: The primary email address with PayPal is not confirmed.

LocaleResource.Name: PaymentsReceivable.True
LocaleResource.Value: Payments can be received with this account.

LocaleResource.Name: PaymentsReceivable.False
LocaleResource.Value: No payments can be received with this account. Please contact PayPal.

LocaleResource.Name: RatePayLegalHint
LocaleResource.Value: By clicking on the button, you agree to the terms of payment and performance of a risk check from the payment partner, Ratepay. You also agree to PayPal’s privacy statement. If your request to purchase upon invoice is accepted, the purchase price claim will be assigned to Ratepay, and you may only pay Ratepay, not the merchant.

LocaleResource.Name: PhoneNumber.Invalid
LocaleResource.Value: Please enter a valid telephone number without spaces.

LocaleResource.Name: Error.CreditCardData
LocaleResource.Value: Please verify your credit card information.

LocaleResource.Name: Error.3DSecure
LocaleResource.Value: An error has occurred when confirming your card with your card provider.

LocaleResource.Name: CartHasChanged
LocaleResource.Value: Your shopping cart has changed after login. Please confirm your current shopping cart with PayPal.

LocaleResource.Name: NoScriptsLoaded
LocaleResource.Value: For payments with PayPal the necessary scripts were not loaded.

LocaleResource.Name: NoClientToken
LocaleResource.Value: The credit card payment method via PayPal is currently not available. Please try again later.

LocaleResource.Name: SupportTools.Intro
LocaleResource.Value: The displayed values were retrieved by passing the client ID stored here to the PayPal API. They come directly from PayPal.

LocaleResource.Name: SupportTools.OnboardingHint
LocaleResource.Value: Please first perform the onboarding or store your access data in the configuration fields provided.
